shortdesc.ph: Occurs when a user rejoins the channel after disconnection due to network problems.

section.p: When a user loses connection with the server because of network problems, the SDK automatically tries to reconnect and triggers this callback upon reconnection.

plentry.pd: The channel name. This parameter is assigned based on the channel name specified when calling to join the channel.
User ID This parameter is assigned based on the user ID specified when joining the channel. If the user ID is not specified when joining the channel, the Agora server will automatically assign an ID.
The elapsed time (milliseconds) from the local reconnection to the occurrence of this event.
